Body:
template = """
text text la la
% if foo():
 mroe text la la blah blah
% endif

        and osme more stuff
        % for l in range(1,5):
    tex tesl asdl l is ${l} kfmas d
      % endfor
    tetx text

"""
nodes = Lexer(template).parse()
self._compare(nodes, TemplateNode({}, [Text("""
text text la la
""", (1, 1)
    ), ControlLine('if', 'if foo():', False, (3, 1)), Text(
    ' mroe text la la blah blah\n', (4, 1)), ControlLine('if', 'endif', 
    True, (5, 1)), Text("""
        and osme more stuff
""", (6, 1)),
    ControlLine('for', 'for l in range(1,5):', False, (8, 1)), Text(
    '    tex tesl asdl l is ', (9, 1)), Expression('l', [], (9, 24)), Text(
    ' kfmas d\n', (9, 28)), ControlLine('for', 'endfor', True, (10, 1)),
    Text('    tetx text\n\n', (11, 1))]))
